mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ${boardClass} vc, accounts ac where boardId = #{boardId} and vc.accountId = ac.accountId and replyCommentId is NULL order by commentId desc
SELECT * FROM ${boardClass} vc, accounts ac where vc.accountId = ac.accountId and replyCommentId = #{replyCommentId} order by commentId desc
SELECT EXISTS (select * from ${boardClass} where boardId = #{boardId} and replyCommentId = #{commentId} ) as rec
mapper.insert: insert into ${boardClass}(accountId, boardId, object, reg_date, mod_date) values(#{accountId}, #{boardId}, #{object}, now(), now())
insert into ${boardClass}(accountId, boardId, object, replyCommentId, reg_date, mod_date) values(#{accountId}, #{boardId}, #{object}, #{replyCommentId}, now(), now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ${boardClass} WHERE commentId = #{commentId} or replyCommentId = #{commentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ${boardClass} SET object = #{object}, mod_date = now() WHERE commentId = #{commentId}
